com.basho.riak.client.core.query.timeseries

Class FullColumnDescription

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.basho.riak.client.core.query.timeseries.ColumnDescription
      • com.basho.riak.client.core.query.timeseries.FullColumnDescription

  • public class FullColumnDescription
extends ColumnDescription
    Holds a complete definition for a Table Column in Time Series Riak. Immutable once created.
    Since:
    2.0.4
    Author:
    Alex Moore

    • Constructor Detail

      • FullColumnDescription

        public FullColumnDescription(String name,
                             ColumnDescription.ColumnType type,
                             boolean isNullable)
        Creates a basic FullColumnDescription, for non-key columns.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the column. Required - must not be null or an empty string.
        type - The type of the column. Required - must not be null.
        isNullable - The nullability of the column.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if Column Name or Column Type are null or empty.

      • FullColumnDescription

        public FullColumnDescription(String name,
                             ColumnDescription.ColumnType type,
                             boolean isNullable,
                             Integer keyOrdinal)
        Creates a FullColumnDescription. Useful for key columns where the partition and local key oridinals are the same.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the column. Required - must not be null or an empty string.
        type - The type of the column. Required - must not be null.
        isNullable - The nullability of the column.
        keyOrdinal - The ordinal number of where this column appears in the ordered Local Key column set. Use null if not a key column.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if Column Name or Column Type are null or empty.

      • FullColumnDescription

        public FullColumnDescription(String name,
                             ColumnDescription.ColumnType type,
                             boolean isNullable,
                             Integer partitionKeyOrdinal,
                             Integer localKeyOrdinal)
        Creates a FullColumnDescription. Useful for automating creation of FullColumnDescriptions where the values can vary.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the column. Required - must not be null or an empty string.
        type - The type of the column. Required - must not be null.
        isNullable - The nullability of the column.
        partitionKeyOrdinal - The ordinal number of where this column appears in the ordered Partition Key column set. Use null if not a key column.
        localKeyOrdinal - The ordinal number of where this column appears in the ordered Local Key column set. Use null if not a key column.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if Column Name or Column Type are null or empty.

    • Method Detail

      • isNullable

        public boolean isNullable()
        Whether this column's values are nullable.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • isPartitionKeyMember

        public boolean isPartitionKeyMember()
        Whether this column is a member of the Partition Key column set.
        Returns:
        boolean.

      • isLocalKeyMember

        public boolean isLocalKeyMember()
        Whether this column is a member of the Local Key column set.
        Returns:
        boolean.

      • getPartitionKeyOrdinal

        public Integer getPartitionKeyOrdinal()
        Get the ordinal number of where this column appears in the ordered Partition Key column set.
        Returns:
        Integer if isPartitionKeyMember() is true, null if isPartitionKeyMember() is false.

      • getLocalKeyOrdinal

        public Integer getLocalKeyOrdinal()
        Get the ordinal number of where this column appears in the ordered Local Key column set.
        Returns:
        Integer if isLocalKeyMember() is true, null if isLocalKeyMember() is false.
